nodes.title: Do not write mismatched palette and data sizes to disk
new: optimized redstone wire
update gradle,fabric,lazydfu
Use kd-tree for fast nearest-neighbor biome lookups
Optimize parts of the entity cramming check
Ignore macOS files
Remove Jumploader from Readme
Update upload artifact and java-setup to v2
Update deps
Update Gradle and Loom
Updated loom to 0.6-SNAPSHOT (1.17)
Updated loom to 0.6-SNAPSHOT (1.16)
Minor Changes
Update Loom Version
change: remove seemingly useless part of lithium.mixins.json
remove redundant chmod +x gradlew
Multiline mixin targets
Fix gradle mavenLocal publishing
Update fabric.mod.json
Update fabric.mod.json
Update To 1.16.5 Fabric
Hopper Item Search optimisation
Extend ChunkRegionMixin to use the chunk array for setBlockState and getTopY
Implement a cache for chunk generator settings
Implement a faster biome array implementation for the overworld
Fix the description text for lithium API directory.
fix: Update project homepage
Fix a grammatical error
Add support for 1.16.4
change: allow compatibility with both 1.16.2 and 1.16.3
new: optimize VoxelShapes.matchesAnywhere using simplicity of cuboid shapes
new: use precomputed merged retracting piston base shapes and avoid VoxelShapes.union on empty shapes
change BlockEntityList to have more explicit side effects and support multiple blockentities at the same location
Correctly clean counter to fix contains method
new: remove allocations in composter's implementation of getAvailableSlots
Apply thread-local cache to InitLayer and MergingLayer
new: optimize `BlockPos.iterateOutwards` by caching offsets
new: Remove some streams from brain tasks
change: Follow project code style standards
new: skip fire/lava check in movement code when possible
new: Eliminate dynamic dispatch in some block state functions
change: Initially enable the palette container lock removal patch
update: Manually inline all fluid state access functions in chunk class
new: Speeding up common BlockPos functions
General code and performance improvements
update: Completely exclude Stream API from mob goal selection system
new: Optimize block entity ticking & unloading
Fix explosions being different from vanilla
Update to 1.16.2
change: Work on existing patches to squeeze out additional performance
Cache slime chunks
Make minor optimizations to Piglin group aggro
bump loom version
new: cache netherrack blob generation
Speed up locating structures greatly
new: add chunk sections counting oversized blocks and reduce number of blocks collision is checked against
new: use shape cache in collision code
new: Include complete entity listener description in IllegalStateException message
fix: add hitboxes inside some voxelshapes of cuboids
fix: TagImplMixin breaks hotswap because its target does not exist
fix: wrong range calculation in NearbyEntityTracker constructor
Mod overrides for config values
Fast caching for biome layer sampling (successor to #59)
fix: stacked tnt explode at the wrong height #66
new: cache noise used in the end to reduce computation time
new: Implement some new performance-optimizing patches
new: avoid sampling in the chunk generator when possible
Optimize the nether biome generator
new: faster implementation of ScaleLayer
Fast caching for biome layer sampling
Use faster cache implementation for isShapeFullCube check
fix broken images & links in readme
change: Add installation instructions for Lithium.
new: Optimize entity data tracker
new: Make entities only get relevant entities for collisions by tracking custom entity class groups in chunk entity lists
Add extra collision check with block below entity to cancel momentum …
Use type specific entity retrieval to replace predicates
Evaluate getEntityCollisions lazily and place block collisions earlier in the stream
Allow hotswapping by removing "switch on enum" in mixin classes.
Fix Creepers sometimes not pathfinding to the player caused by incorrect chunk cache initialization
Update link discord logo
Entity getting optimizations
change: Improved performance of Voronoi a bit more.
Fixed #29 Lithium breaks stray cat behavior.
Extended entity tracker engine with ExactPositionListeners
Update for 20w13b
ChunkRandom optimizations
Fix the mod's icon having the wrong name.
Refactor world border collision
entity chunk cache 2: electric boogaloo
Items now insert themselves into hoppers rather than hoppers searching the entity list
Add Gradle wrapper
Fix sitting in net/minecraft
